typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.ResultInfo
typeDescription.description: Meta-information on the retrieved search result

featureDescription.name: relevance
featureDescription.description: Relevance of the result; a metric between [0,1]

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The name of the data source.

featureDescription.name: documentId
featureDescription.description: ID of the document (specific to data source)

featureDescription.name: isLast
featureDescription.description: Whether this is the last search result

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.Passage
typeDescription.description: Interesting passages of the search result that will be examined in more detail.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: Score of the passage regarding relevance likelihood.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence of the answer (without regard to the search result confidence)

featureDescription.name: passage
featureDescription.description: The passage this answer belongs to. (Or one of them.)

featureDescription.name: base
featureDescription.description: The annotation (or one of them) that eventually spawned this answer.
